author: Paul Kasabian
title: USA Basketball's Jerry Colangelo 'Pleased' with Postponement of 2020 Olympics
description: The 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo are officially  postponed  to no later than the summer of 2021 amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.  USA Basketball chairman Jerry Colangelo supports the decision, as told to The Athletic's  Michael Lee ...
content:
Nathaniel S. Butler/Getty Images
The 2020 Summer Olympics in Tokyo are officially postponed to no later than the summer of 2021 amid the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic.
USA Basketball chairman Jerry Colangelo supports the decision, as told to The Athletic's Mich… [+2009 chars]
